verses.verse: In those <S%H3117>days<s%> was <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H2470>sick<s%> unto <S%H4191>death<s%>. And <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H531>Amoz<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H559>him<s%>, and said unto <S%H559>him<s%>, Thus saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Set thy <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H6680>order<s%>: for thou shalt <S%H4191>die<s%>, and not <S%H2421>live<s%>.
Then he <S%H5437>turned<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H7023>wall<s%>, and <S%H6419>prayed<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H3068>now<s%>, O Jehovah, I <S%H577>beseech<s%> <S%H1980>thee<s%>, how I have walked <S%H6440>before<s%> thee in <S%H571>truth<s%> and with a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and have <S%H6213>done<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>. And <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H1419>sore<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3470>pass<s%>, before Isaiah was gone <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H2691>part<s%> of the <S%H1697>city<s%>, that the word of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came to <S%H559>him<s%>, saying,

Turn <S%H7725>back<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> the <S%H5057>prince<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%>, I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> thy <S%H8605>prayer<s%>, I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> thy <S%H1832>tears<s%>: <S%H7495>behold<s%>, I will heal <S%H7992>thee<s%>; on the third <S%H3117>day<s%> thou shalt go <S%H5927>up<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And I will <S%H3254>add<s%> unto thy <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>; and I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> thee and this <S%H5892>city<s%> out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>; and I will <S%H1598>defend<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%> for mine own <S%H5650>sake<s%>, and for my servant <S%H1732>David<s%>'s sake.

And <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> a <S%H1690>cake<s%> of <S%H8384>figs<s%>. And they <S%H3947>took<s%> and <S%H7760>laid<s%> it on the <S%H7822>boil<s%>, and he <S%H2421>recovered<s%>.

And <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%>, What shall be the <S%H226>sign<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H7495>heal<s%> <S%H5927>me<s%>, and that I shall go up unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>?

And <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, This shall be the <S%H226>sign<s%> unto thee from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that he hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%>: shall the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> go <S%H1980>forward<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%>, or go <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%>?

And <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%>, It is a light <S%H7043>thing<s%> for the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> to <S%H5186>decline<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%>: <S%H6738>nay<s%>, but let the shadow <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H322>backward<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%>.

And <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H7121>cried<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and he <S%H7725>brought<s%> the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%> <S%H322>backward<s%>, <S%H4609>by<s%> which it had gone <S%H3381>down<s%> on the <S%H4609>dial<s%> of <S%H271>Ahaz<s%>.

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H1255>Berodach-baladan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1081>Baladan<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> and a <S%H4503>present<s%> unto <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%>; for he had <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> had been <S%H2470>sick<s%>.

And <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto <S%H7200>them<s%>, and showed them all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his precious <S%H5238>things<s%>, the <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and the <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and the <S%H1314>spices<s%>, and the <S%H2896>precious<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H3627>armor<s%>, and all that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in his <S%H214>treasures<s%>: there was <S%H1697>nothing<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%>, nor in all his <S%H4475>dominion<s%>, that <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> showed them <S%H7200>not<s%>.

Then <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> unto <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H559>him<s%>, What said these <S%H582>men<s%>? and from <S%H370>whence<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> they unto <S%H2396>thee<s%>? And Hezekiah <S%H559>said<s%>, They are <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>, even from <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, What have they <S%H7200>seen<s%> in thy <S%H1004>house<s%>? And <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%>, All that is in my <S%H1004>house<s%> have they <S%H7200>seen<s%>: there is <S%H1697>nothing<s%> among my <S%H214>treasures<s%> that I have not showed <S%H7200>them<s%>.
And <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Behold <S%H3117><s%>, the days <S%H935>come<s%>, that all that is in thy <S%H1004>house<s%>, and that which thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> have laid up in <S%H686>store<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, shall be <S%H5375>carried<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>: <S%H1697>nothing<s%> shall be <S%H3498>left<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And of thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> that shall <S%H3318>issue<s%> from <S%H3205>thee<s%>, whom thou shalt beget, shall they take <S%H3947>away<s%>; and they shall be <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> in the <S%H1964>palace<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> unto <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%>, <S%H2896>Good<s%> is the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> which thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%>. He <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7965>moreover<s%>, Is it not so, if peace and <S%H571>truth<s%> shall be in my <S%H3117>days<s%>?

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%>, and all his <S%H1369>might<s%>, and how he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H1295>pool<s%>, and the <S%H8585>conduit<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%>, are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>?
And <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%>; and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>stead<s%>.
